entry.title: 54" x 108" Hunter Emerald Green 10 Mil Thick Chevron Waterproof Tablecloth PVC Rectangle Disposable Tablecloth

Color: Hunter Emerald Green | White

Product Width: 54 inches
Product Thickness: 10 mil
Design: Chevron
Shape: Rectangle
Reusable: Yes
Seamless: Yes
Durable: Yes
Waterproof: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Durability of high quality PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride) material is combined with the jazzy appeal of chic chevron design in these Waterproof Tablecloth to give you an absolute luxury for your upcoming catering or culinary event.  Perfect for setting an elegant table at your picnic, banquets, holiday parties, or for casual eateries, our heavy duty plastic vinyl tablecloths are thick enough to give your tables all the protection required. No need to spend your quality time and efforts on cleaning and ironing the tablecloths. These plastic table cloths are an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. From the huge array of exciting colors available, choose the color that complements your event's theme.

Multi-Use

These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

Decorative

Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.

Durable

Our Waterproof Tablecloth is made from high quality vinyl which gives you superior strength and durability and also provides the convenience of disposability that your events require.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Plastic
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green | White
  • Product Length: 108 inches
  • Product Width: 54 inches
  • Product Thickness: 10 mil
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
  • How to Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth

entry.title: 4FT x 9FT | Portable Isolation Wall with Artificial Grass Wall Panels, Floor Standing Sneeze Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Backdrops
Price: 204.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Set Table Divider

Item Includes:

  • 1 Custom Adjustable Backdrop Stand With Steel Base
  • 12 Velcro Straps
  • 8 Artificial Grass Wall Panels

Backdrop Stand

  • Size: Adjustable, Max 10ftx10ft
  • Material: Metal
  • Comes With:
    • 2 Stand Bases: 18" long x 18" wide x 3/16" thick
    • 2 Adjustable Height Support Stands: 5FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • 1 Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars: 4FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • Pole Diameter: 1.25"
    • Cross Bar Diameter: 3cm Largest end

Velcro Straps:

  • Total Velcro Straps: 12 Pcs
  • Material: Fabric Material w/Velcro Fastener
  • Size: 8" Long x 0.5" Wide
  • Self Gripping: Yes (Wraps onto itself)
  • Features: Reusable, Durable and Adjustable, Easy to use

    Artificial Grass Wall Panels:

    • Durable & Dense boxwood hedge
    • Material: Plastic
    • Total Wall Panels: 8pcs
    • Each Panel Size: 24" x 16"
    • Panel Thickness: 1"
    Simple Set-Up, Easy To Assemble
    Note: This Isolation Wall Kit Combo is for size 4FT Wide x 9FT High
    There will be 3.5 FT of space from the Bottom. Can adjust to preference
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

     

    [Information]

    Additional Information:

    • Backdrop Stand
      • Capacity: 25 lbs max
      • Total Weight: 34.58 lbs
      • Cross bar locking system at top of 2 support stands
      • How to set up:
        • Connect the support stand to the base
        • Insert the adjustable width telescopic cross bar on top of the stand
        • To Tighten: Turn Knob RIGHT
        • To Loosen: Turn Knob LEFT
    • Velcro Strips
      • Can be combined if too short or cut to size if too long
      • Perfect to fasten up DIY decorations to walls, ceilings, arches, chairs, tables, poles, and columns.
    • Artificial Grass Wall Panels
      • Durable & Dense boxwood hedge
      • Anti-fading yarn; UV Protected
      • High quality materials used; offers a more genuine and softer touch
      • Reinforced backing with built-in pin & hole locking
      • Thicker sturdy backing with drainage
    • Uses: Offices, Schools, Gyms, Restaurants, Hair & Nail Salons, Casinos, Churches, and many other businesses and organizations.

entry.title: 5FT x 9FT | Clear Portable Isolation Wall Kit, Floor Standing Sneeze Guard
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Backdrops
Price: 144.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Set Table Divider

Item Includes:

  • 1 Custom Adjustable Backdrop Stand With Steel Base
  • 6 Backdrop Clamps
  • 1 Vinyl Drape

Backdrop Stand

  • Size: Adjustable, Max 10ftx10ft
  • Material: Metal
  • Comes With:
    • 2 Stand Bases: 18" long x 18" wide x 3/16" thick
    • 2 Adjustable Height Support Stands: 5FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • 1 Adjustable Width Telescopic Cross Bars: 4FT (smallest) to 10FT (longest)
    • Pole Diameter: 1.25"
    • Cross Bar Diameter: 3cm Largest end

Backdrop Clamps:

  • Total Clamps: 6 Pcs
  • Material: Heavy Duty Plastic
  • Clip Size: 4.5" Long x 2" Wide
  • Movable tips for maximum fit and tension

    Vinyl Drape:

    • Size: 9FT Long x 5 FT Wide
    • Thickness: 10 Mil
    • Serged Edge: 4 mm
    Simple Set-Up, Easy To Assemble
    Note: This Isolation Wall Kit Combo is for size 5FT Wide x 9FT High
    There will be 3.5 FT of space from the Bottom. Can adjust to preference
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

     

    [Information]

     

    Isolation Partition Walls

    As we are adapting to the new normal and carry on with the reopening process of businesses, educational institutions as well as continuation of events and festivities, it has become necessary to adhere to safety measures and social distancing rules for the safety of our guests, employees, customers, or students. Isolation Partition Walls, Dividing Partitions, or Sneeze Guards are the ideal solution for events and businesses that are required to follow social distancing protocols. This backdrop divider is freestanding, portable, easy to assemble, and give your guests, customers, and employees the protection they need.

    Social Distancing Divider

    Our Social Distancing Divider comes with an adjustable telescopic stand that can be adjusted as per your needs, a transparent vinyl sheet to ensure unhindered communication yet unsurpassed protection and clamps to keep sheet firmly at place. With a super wide 10 ft. width, this kit spans significantly longer than its Plexiglas and acrylic substitutes, while is a fraction of cost. Our Portable Partition Kit is ideal for both indoor and outdoor functions, small and large gatherings, weddings, holiday parties, and even for corporate events.

    		   

    Versatile and Multifunctional

    Versatile and multifunctional, these freestanding units can be used individually or connected to make wider partitions, walls or other structures like cubes or L-shapes. They can be used to separate tables or desks, sitting arrangements, perfect for plastic workout cubes at gym, isolate teachers from students, or as a way to create directional queuing in passages or hallways. Ensuring maximum protection, these Social Distancing Clear Vinyl Dividers are reusable as vinyl sheets can be washed or wiped down easily.

     


    Additional Information:

    • Backdrop Stand
      • Capacity: 25 lbs max
      • Total Weight: 34.58 lbs
      • Cross bar locking system at top of 2 support stands
      • How to set up:
        • Connect the support stand to the base
        • Insert the adjustable width telescopic cross bar on top of the stand
        • To Tighten: Turn Knob RIGHT
        • To Loosen: Turn Knob LEFT
    • Backdrop Clamps
      • Strong metal spring applies consistent pressure
      • Easy to use and re-position
    • Vinyl Protector
      • Thickness: 10 Mil
      • Serged Edge: 4 mm
      • Features: Reusable, Eco Friendly, Waterproof
    • Uses: Offices, Schools, Gyms, Restaurants, Hair & Nail Salons, Casinos, Churches, and many other businesses and organizations.

entry.title: 50 Pcs | Silicon Mask Buckle For Adjusting Mask Rope | Ear Loop Adjuster
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Medical Supplies
Price: 1.99

[About]

Qty : 50 Adjustable Buckles & 2 Metal Clips
Material : Silicon
Color : Black

Features :

  • Can be used to adjust the length of mask rope or sewing accessories.
  • Reduce ear scratching, reduce ear pressure and fatigue.
  • Easy to adjust, suitable for people who need to wear masks for a long time.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Additional Information:

  • Toggle Diameter: 0.25"
  • Toggle Small Opening Diameter: 2mm
  • Toggle Large Opening Diameter: 4mm
  • Total Toggles: 50 pcs

  • Total Clips: 2 pcs
